sense.gloss: to arrive (season, time, situation, etc.), to come, to appear
to send a letter, to inquire about a letter

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちに↑春↑↓はる↓が↑当地↑↓とうち↓に↑訪↑↓|おとず↓れる|だろう。
